properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Baldwin, GA; Wilkinson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 4:01AM EST until February 8 at 3:18PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...Observed and Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Milledgeville.
* Until Saturday afternoon.
* At 3 AM Friday the stage was 32.6 feet...and rising.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and is forecast.
* Flood stage is 22 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 33.6 feet by 7 AM this morning
and will fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning.
* At 32.0 feet...Moderate flooding begins and expands further into
the woodlands and pastures along the river. Fishing Creek continues
to back up and spread further into woodland areas and covers some
roads in low lying areas. Tanyard Branch Stream continues to flood.
Sinclair Dam will likely have five gates open to reach this height.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.

NWSheadline: Observed and forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity...
